issue.message: Don't put classes in the io.embrace.android.embracesdk package unless they're part of the public API. Please move the new class to an appropriate package or (if you're adding to the public API) suppress this error via the lint baseline file.

Don't put classes in the io.embrace.android.embracesdk package unless they're part of the public API. Please move the new class to an appropriate package or (if you're adding to the public API) suppress this error via the lint baseline file.
The `beginSection()` call is not always closed with a matching `endSection()` because the code in between may return early
